Source.Name: bluez-qt
Source.Summary: Qt wrapper for BlueZ 5 DBus API
Source.Description: BluezQt is a library for communication with BlueZ system and session daemons. * Manager class is used to communicate with system daemon - org.bluez * ObexManager class is used to communicate with session daemon - org.bluez.obex

Package.Name: bluez-qt
Package.Summary: Qt wrapper for BlueZ 5 DBus API
Package.Description: BluezQt is a library for communication with BlueZ system and session daemons. * Manager class is used to communicate with system daemon - org.bluez * ObexManager class is used to communicate with session daemon - org.bluez.obex
